introduction: How have birthday cakes changed over the years? For audio and transcript downloads, plus a quiz and

vocabulary.definition: exceeding what is reasonable or appropriate; excessive
vocabulary.example: The birthday party featured an extravagant cake covered in edible gold leaf.

vocabulary.definition: made or designed to meet individual specifications
vocabulary.example: The baker created a personalised birthday cake with the recipient's favorite cartoon characters.

vocabulary.definition: in a disordered or random manner
vocabulary.example: The decorations on the cake were placed higgledy-piggledy, giving it a unique look.

vocabulary.definition: the amount of freedom to act or make decisions
vocabulary.example: The artist was given leeway to choose the color scheme for the birthday cake.

vocabulary.definition: worth remembering or easily remembered, especially because of being special or unusual
vocabulary.example: The birthday cake was not only delicious but also visually stunning, making it a truly memorable experience.
The baker put in a lot of effort to create an intricately designed birthday cake for the customer.
